plugins/mochad/plugin_info/info.xml.Plugin pour gérer des équipements X10 vi: Plugin for controlling X10 devices with a Mochad daemon and a CM15 gateway
plugins/mochad/plugin_info/info.xml.Vous devez avoir Mochad d'installer.\n\t:
You need have Mochad installed.
⇥If Jeedom min
⇥ "wget -q http://IP_OF_MINI/plugins/mochad/ressources/install-mochad.sh | sudo bash"
⇥else
⇥ "wget -q http://127.0.0.1/jeedom/plugins/mochad/ressources/install-mochad.sh | sudo bash"
